### 2) Replicate the “National cable news networks” plot using the tv_states data. Don’t worry about all the labels. Try to match the colors but don’t worry about getting them exact.

```{r part2_amiller}

#load packages
library(rio)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
#install.packages("fivethirtyeight")
library(fivethirtyeight)
library(lubridate)

#load data
tv_data <- tv_states %>%
  gather(location, share, florida:puerto_rico) 

tv_data$date <- round_date(tv_data$date, unit = "week")

tv_data %>%
  mutate(lubridate::mdy(date))

#ggplot(tv_data, aes(x = date)) +
  #geom_histogram(aes(color = location)) +

```
